competitor_summaries.title: Google AI Blog
competitor_summaries.summary: Covers Google's research and advancements in AI, including machine learning.  Focuses on technical details and applications.
competitor_summaries.structure_pattern: Blog posts with clear headings, subheadings, and often code examples.
strengths: High authority, strong technical depth, wide reach
weaknesses: Can be too technical for beginners, less focus on practical applications for non-experts

competitor_summaries.title: AWS Machine Learning Blog
competitor_summaries.summary: Focuses on using machine learning with AWS services.  Practical tutorials and case studies are common.
competitor_summaries.structure_pattern: Blog posts with clear steps, code snippets, and links to AWS resources.
strengths: Practical, hands-on approach, relevant to AWS users

competitor_summaries.title: Towards Data Science
competitor_summaries.summary: A Medium publication covering various data science topics, including machine learning.  Wide range of contributors and styles.
competitor_summaries.tone_style: Varied, from highly technical to introductory; generally accessible
competitor_summaries.structure_pattern: Blog posts with varying structures, often including visualizations and code.
strengths: Broad reach, diverse content, caters to various skill levels
weaknesses: Quality can vary due to multiple contributors, less editorial control

common_patterns: Use of clear headings and subheadings
Inclusion of code examples or snippets
Focus on practical applications or research
differentiation_opportunities: Focus on a niche area within machine learning
what_to_replicate: Use of visuals and code examples
what_to_avoid: Too much technical jargon without explanation
